update.description:
The last detail to complete pull request #1506 and sync with the [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=apply_force_torque&cat=tools_utilities). (See longer history [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1731/rotate-force-torque-with-mouse-on-apply/diff))

Targeted at default because we're in gazebo6 feature freeze.

Back in the original pull request, the movable text used to cause crashes, especially when changing the camera angle. I haven't been able to reproduce this on this branch. Just in case, I'm working on a unit test for movable text, which will come in a separate pull request since I think it's out of scope here.

![applyForceMany.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1363805076-applyForceMany.png)

content.raw:
ah ok didn't realize that it inherits from `MovableObject` and `Renderable`, both of which have the `getUserObjectBindings()` function defined. That's not great.

The way you have it now should be good.
content.html:
ah ok didn't realize that it inherits from MovableObject and Renderable, both of which have the getUserObjectBindings() function defined. That's not great.

The way you have it now should be good.

content.html:
It doesn't compile:

/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:172:20: error: request for member ‘getUserObjectBindings’ is ambiguous
   dPtr->forceText->getUserObjectBindings().setUserAny(
                    ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreShadowCaster.h:32:0,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreMovableObject.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreBillboardChain.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:40,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/MovableText.hh:28,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:21:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgreRenderable.h:360:29: note: candidates are: const Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::Renderable::getUserObjectBindings() const
   const UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() const { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                             ^
/usr/include/OGRE/OgreRenderable.h:354:23: note:                 Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::Renderable::getUserObjectBindings()
   UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                       ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/OgreBillboardChain.h:37:0,
                 from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:40,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/MovableText.hh:28,
                 from /home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazeboA/gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:21:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgreMovableObject.h:345:29: note:                 const Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::MovableObject::getUserObjectBindings() const
   const UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() const { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                             ^
/usr/include/OGRE/OgreMovableObject.h:339:23: note:                 Ogre::UserObjectBindings& Ogre::MovableObject::getUserObjectBindings()
   UserObjectBindings& getUserObjectBindings() { return mUserObjectBindings; }
                       ^
